attributes.action: ensure that all national sporting events and any qualification for such events be available on free-to-air televison channels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the Football Association selling the rights to screen big tournament qualification matches it's about time that the government acted to make sure that sporting events of national interest are not just available to those that can afford them but to all people whatever their finacial situation. Please sign this petition before we end up paying to watch the world cup finals, the olympics etc.
